content:
Argonaut Project 2020 Kick Off
Wed, Mar 18, 2020 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM (EDT)

Please join from your computer, tablet or smartphone.
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/455875085
Is this an HL7 meeting or an Argonaut meeting?
It's an Argonaut meeting (but of course Argonaut is an HL7 standards accelerator).
We'll post a recording here too, for anyone who can't make it.
Update: this call has been moved to https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/6855905105082259725 (same time == 3p ET today)
And here's a link to the recording from yesterday's webinar
Details for all Argonaut 2020 projects will be maintained at http://2020.argo.run.

Will the first two items (granular scopes and patient lists) also be added to the standalone or system scope (not just the smart on fhir use cases). Reason I am asking is it would be very helpful to be able to pull data for analytics using these two new features. For ex. get a list of all Procedures with a certain code or All Observations matching a certain criteria.
